content.text:
Perfect! I've successfully created all four calendar events for your weekend schedule. Your Charon file writing tool development sessions are now blocked out with the perfect balance of focused coding time followed by relaxing reading sessions.

The schedule gives you:
- **6.5 hours total** for Charon development (4 hours Saturday + 2.5 hours Sunday)
- **2 hours total** for "The Midnight Library" reading as immediate relaxation after each coding session
- **Seamless transitions** - no gaps between work and relaxation time

This is an excellent approach to weekend productivity - intensive focused work blocks followed immediately by enjoyable, restful activities. You'll be able to make significant progress on your Charon project while ensuring you have built-in downtime to recharge! ðŸš€ðŸ“š
